title: It's The Perfect Time For The Conjuring TV Series | Comic Con 2023
description:
With ten years of strong world-building at its back, the fourth and potentially final Conjuring movie announced, and a streaming series in development for Max, the Conjuring Universe has everything it needs to succeed in whatever demonically-possessed form it takes in the future.

#IGN #SDCC

title: The unmissable #SDCC booths #marvel #funko #starwars #finalfantasy #onepunchmanworld #shorts
description: Presented by One Punch Man: World

title: Kevin Smith Tries To Sell IGN A Boat | Comic Con 2023
description:
Kevin Smith and the View Askewniverse are hitting the high seas next year on Cruise Askew: a celebration of all things Clerks, Mallrats, and Jay and Silent Bob. IGN caught up with the King of Comic Con at Mooby's to investigate whether or not Kevin (and a surprise guest!) have seaworthy plans to deal with all manner of maritime mayhem. 

Presented by One Punch Man: World

#IGN #SDCC

title: Hasbro's 2023 Toy Line-Up | Comic Con 2023
description:
Hasbro is celebrating its 100th anniversary at San Diego Comic Con by giving a sneak preview of the toys they're working on for kids and the young at heart. The line-up includes figures from the Indiana Jones Adventure Series, Marvel Legends Series, Transformers, and more!

#IGN #SDCC

title: Jordan Peele Called Talk To Me's Directors After Being "Inspired" By The Movie | Comic Con 2023
description:
Australian YouTube stars Danny & Michael Philippou come roaring onto the horror scene with their directorial debut Talk To Me, a visceral and relentless Bloody Maryesque tale for the viral age. The Philippou brothers take the stage to discuss how horror luminaries like Jordan Peele have reacted to their movie, and how classic horror stories like The Monkey's Paw influenced the story.

Presented by One Punch Man: World

title: Crazy Detailed Figures from the Premium Collectibles Booth | Comic Con 2023
description:
The makers of the soon-to-be-released Spider-Man 2 collector's edition have a booth on the 2023 San Diego Comic Con show floor where you can see crazy detailed busts and figures from iconic characters such as Venom from Spider-Man and $1200 Morrigan statue from Dark Stalkers.

Presented by One Punch Man: World

#IGN #SDCC

title: Reservation Dogs: The Story So Far + New Season 3 Trailer | Comic Con 2023
description:
Reservation Dogs is back for it’s final season on August 2, 2023 so we’re here to give you a quick recap of Season 1 + 2 plus a look at the brand new trailer for Season 3, and it’s all presented by Reservation Dogs. 

Streaming on Hulu and created by Sterlin Harjo and Taika Waititi (Thor: Ragnarok, JoJo Rabbit, What We Do in the Shadows), Reservation Dogs follows the exploits of four Indigenous teenagers Bear Smallhill (D'Pharaoh Woon-A-Tai), Elora Dana Postoak (Devery Jacobs) , Chester “Cheese” Williams (Lane Factor), and Wilhelmina "Willie Jack" Jacqueline Sampson (Paulina Alexis). They live  in rural Oklahoma who steal, rob and save in order to get to the exotic, mysterious and faraway land of California. 
It is the first series to feature all Indigenous writers and directors, along with an almost entirely Indigenous North American cast and production team.

The FX series, Reservation Dogs, streams their third and final season on Hulu August 2, 2023.

#IGN #SDCC

title: Can James Gunn's Superman: Legacy Save DC? | Comic Con 2023
description:
With James Gunn's Superman: Legacy launching a new version of the DC Universe (and saying goodbye to the DCEU) already populated with DC characters Hawkgirl, Green Lantern Guy Gardner, Mister Terrific, and Metamorpho, there are a lot of expectations for this new era of DC. IGN's Max Scoville, Kim Horcher, and Joshua Yehl discuss and debate the casting of new Clark Kent David Corwenswet and Lois Land Rachel Brosnahan, whether Superman: Legacy will be too overstuffed with setup, and the most important question of all: trunks or no trunks? 

Presented by The Xfinity 10G Network

#IGN #SDCC #SupermanLegacy

title: Street Fighter 6: Rashid DLC Reactions | Comic Con 2023
description:
Capcom brought Street Fighter 6's first DLC character to San Diego Comic Con 2023, and we got first reactions from players who went hands-on with Rashid. Plus, we ask the SF6 dev team how they've felt about Street Fighter 6's launch to this point.

#IGN #SDCC #StreetFighter

title: Watch This $1700 Transformer Do Their Thing | Comic Con 2023
description:
Logan Webster, the Senior Vice President of Robosen stops by the IGN studio to show Max and Brian the incredible Grimlock Transformer, the world's first dual-form, bipedal walking robot that transforms, sings, and does push-ups! Joining Grimlock is a Buzz Lightyear robot inspired by the 2022 film, who shows off his jet pack mist spray features and impressive conversational skills!

Presented by FX’s Reservation Dogs. Streaming August 2nd. Only on Hulu.

#IGN #SDCC

title: The Spider-Man 2 Panel Has Us Excited Again | Comic Con 2023
description:
Daemon, Max, Brian and Stella break down their favorite things about the Spider-Man 2 Comic-Con panel. The long awaited sequel from Insomniac has been hyped for so long, this panel was just the thing to get past the fatigue and get us excited again! From Aunt May's house to J Jonah Jameson and sweet look for Venom, let's break down what we saw from the Hall H Panel.

Presented by The Xfinity 10G Network

title: LEGO Booth Preview - Brickbuster Tour | Comic Con 2023
description:
Take a grand tour inside Brickbuster Video, LEGO's recreation of Blockbuster, and see movie posters, videos, and sets featuring franchises LEGO has collaborated with, such as Star Wars, Marvel, Super Mario, and Sonic the Hedgehog.

You can also play a demo of Sonic Superstars, which features the LEGO DLC.

Presented by One Punch Man: World

#IGN #SDCC #Lego

title: What We Do In The Shadows Recap and Season 5 Trailer | Comic Con 2023
description:
FX's What We Do In The Shadows Season 5 is now streaming on Thursdays on FX, but just in case you need a quick refresher on what happened last season, here is a quick one-minute recap of all the big moments, and it's all presented by FX's What We Do In The Shadows.

This mockumentary comedy horror TV series (airing on FX) is based on the What We Do In The Shadows movie (Jemaine Clement and Taika Waititi). The FX series cast includes Kayvan Novak as Nandor the Relentless, Matt Berry as Leslie "Laszlo" Cravensworth, Natasia Demetriou as Nadja of Antipaxos, Harvey Guillén as Guillermo de la Cruz, Mark Proksch as Colin Robinson, and Kristen Schaal as The Guide.

#IGN #SDCC

title: Super7 ThunderCats ULTIMATES! Cats' Lair Preview | Comic Con 2023
description:
This $650 ThunderCats ULTIMATES! Cats' Lair playset from Super7 is a must-have for ThunderCats fans as it's a nearly three feet tall and four feet wide recreation of the iconic base. Join IGN and Super7's founder Brian Flynn as they give you a detailed look at the playset and reveal what makes it so special.

#IGN #SDCC

title: The Borderlands Movie Has a Release Date...But Still No Trailer - IGN The Fix: Entertainment
description:
In today's Fix of Entertainment News:
That Borderlands movie (that you definitely didn't forget about) has a release date, and it's August 9, 2024. That's a little over a year away, and although there have been the briefest of peeks more than a year ago, we haven't seen even a proper teaser for this movie. The plot isn't adapting any of the games specifically, but it does sound like it's bringing characters from the different games together, so that's cool. And in Star Wars news, John Boyega ranks the Sequel Trilogy movies. Does your ranking stack up to his? This episode is brought to you by Universal Orlando Resort.

title: Square Enix Responds to Final Fantasy 16 Sales Concern - IGN Daily Fix
description:
On today's Daily Fix:
Square Enix has insisted sales of Final Fantasy 16 are “extremely strong”, telling IGN the game has sold well relative to the PlayStation 5 install base. With its prospects of blocking Xbox's Activision Blizzard merger dimming, the Federal Trade Commission is hitting the brakes on its trial scheduled for August. Finally, Blizzard has explained its decision-making around the miniscule drop rate for Diablo 4’s coveted Uber Unique items, insisting obtaining one should be a "fall out of your chair moment".

title: The Borderlands Movie Has a Release Date...But Still No Trailer - IGN The Fix: Entertainment
description:
In today's Fix of Entertainment News:
That Borderlands movie (that you definitely didn't forget about) has a release date, and it's August 9, 2024. That's a little over a year away, and although there have been the briefest of peeks more than a year ago, we haven't seen even a proper teaser for this movie. The plot isn't adapting any of the games specifically, but it does sound like it's bringing characters from the different games together, so that's cool. And in Star Wars news, John Boyega ranks the Sequel Trilogy movies. Does your ranking stack up to his? This episode is brought to you by Universal Orlando Resort.

title: Anne Rice’s Interview with the Vampire Season 2 - Official Teaser Trailer | Comic Con 2023
description:
A sensuous, contemporary reinvention of Anne Rice’s revolutionary gothic novel, Anne Rice’s Interview with the Vampire follows Louis de Pointe du Lac (Jacob Anderson), Lestat de Lioncourt (Sam Reid) and Claudia’s (Bailey Bass) epic story of love, blood, and the perils of immortality, as told to journalist Daniel Molloy (Eric Bogosian). Chafing at the limitations of life as a Black man in 1900s New Orleans, Louis finds it impossible to resist the rakish Lestat de Lioncourt’s offer of the ultimate escape: joining him as his vampire companion.  But Louis’s intoxicating new powers come with a violent price, and the introduction of Lestat’s newest fledgling, the child vampire Claudia, soon sets them on a decades-long path of revenge and atonement.

#IGN #SDCC

title: The Walking Dead: The Ones Who Live - Official Teaser Trailer | Comic Con 2023
description: Andrew Lincoln and Danai Gurira reunite for a new spinoff series that will finally continue the journey of Rick Grimes and Michonne characters. This series presents an epic love story of two characters changed by a changed world. Kept apart by distance. By an unstoppable power. By the ghosts of who they were. Rick and Michonne are thrown into another world, built on a war against the dead... And ultimately, a war against the living. Can they find each other and who they were in a place and situation unlike any they've ever known before? Are they enemies? Lovers? Victims? Victors? Without each other, are they even alive -- or will they find that they, too, are the Walking Dead? Gimple serves as showrunner and executive producer alongside Lincoln and Gurira. The series is set to premiere in 2024.

title: Fear the Walking Dead - Official Retrospective Trailer (Kim Dickens, Cliff Curtis) | Comic Con 2023
description:
The eighth season began after the conclusion of Season 7, when Morgan’s (Lennie James) and Madison's (Kim Dickens) hopes to rescue Mo from PADRE did not go as planned. Now, Morgan, Madison and the others they brought to the island are living under PADRE's cynical rule. With our characters demoralized and dejected, the task of reigniting belief in a better world rests with the person Morgan and Madison set out to rescue in the first place -- Morgan's daughter, Mo.

The second half of the eighth and final season of Fear the Walking Dead returns this Fall on AMC and AMC+.  Fear the Walking Dead was the second series in The Walking Dead Universe, following the flagship show, and debuted as the #1 most-watched cable series premiere of all time.

title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon - Official Trailer (2023) Norman Reedus | Comic Con 2023
description:
In The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon, Daryl (Norman Reedus) washes ashore in France and struggles to piece together how he got there and why. The series tracks his journey across a broken but resilient France as he hopes to find a way back home. As he makes the journey, though, the connections he forms along the way complicate his ultimate plan. The debut of The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon, starring Norman Reedus, is set for September 10 at 9:00 p.m. ET/PT on AMC and AMC+.

In addition to Reedus, the series stars Clémence Poésy, Adam Nagaitis, Anne Charrier, Eriq Ebouaney, Laika Blanc Francard, Romain Levi and Louis Puech Scigliuzzi and is executive produced by Scott M. Gimple, Showrunner David Zabel, Reedus, Greg Nicotero, Angela Kang, Brian Bockrath and Daniel Percival.

#IGN #SDCC

title: BattleBit Remastered Early Access Review
description:
Battlebit Remastered reviewed on PC by Gabriel Moss.

BattleBit Remastered remembers what made Battlefield games great in their heyday: there are no flashy scripted tornados, just big maps teeming with combat hotspots and myriad destructible buildings. That kind of throwback fun shines through even the basic graphics, highlighting how this kind of gameplay was never about realism so much as it is goofy combat chaos with a ton of people. So it’s an easy sell for anyone looking to jump into hectic, squad-based action with hundreds of other players; whether for a few minutes or a few hours. Naturally the early access version isn’t fully cooked yet, especially due to some underbaked mechanics like stupid-fast running speed and clunky vehicle controls. But what already exists is an impressive first swing at what could become a much more comprehensive tribute to the Battlefield series, and even in its current state, it’s already one of the more captivating multiplayer shooters on Steam right now.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Remnant 2 - The First 16 Minutes of Gameplay
description:
Remnant 2 is the 'Souls-like with guns' third-person shooter sequel from Gunfire Games. The fight against the Root continues in these opening minutes; introducing both new characters, and some familiar ones. Captured on PC at 1080p 60fps.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Solar Opposites - Official Season 4 Trailer (2023) Justin Roiland, Thomas Middleditch
description:
Citizens of Earth, prepare yourselves for an epic new season of "Solar Opposites," crash landing on Hulu on Monday, August 14th with 11 episodes, followed by a Valentine's Day special coming in 2024.

#IGN #Hulu #SolarOpposites

title: Wayfinder - Official Early Access Developer Diary
description:
Wayfinder is an action MMO RPG developed by Airship Syndicate. Wayfinder enables players to become a Wayfinder, a warrior able to unlock their powers and choose their path and playstyle to fight back against the hostile forces that have taken their world. Take a look at the first Dev Diary for Wayfinder where the developers go over new aspects like the new character Venomess, the Reward Tower, the Founders Pack, and more. Wayfinder is launching into Early Access on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC on August 15.

#IGN #Gaming #Wayfinder

title: 4 Reasons Pikmin 4 Should Be Your Next Cosy Game
description:
Pikmin 4 sees you exploring an engaging Earth-like world, leading a flock of floral minions to collect treasures, and ticks all the boxes of a cosy game. Whether you’re curling up with a controller on a rainy day or just want to unwind after a day at work, here are 4 reasons why Pikmin 4, which is filled with charming characters and creatures, should be your next cosy game. Sponsored by Nintendo. Sponsored by Nintendo.

#IGN #Gaming #Pikmin

title: Unholy - Official Launch Trailer
description:
Check out the creepy trailer for Unholy, the new psychological horror exploration game from Duality Games. Embark on a terrifying journey as you uncover the horrors facing the protagonist Dorothea. Carefully traverse two parallel worlds in your search to uncover the truth surrounding the disappearance of your son. Unholy is out now on PC via Steam. It'll be released on PS5 and Xbox Series X/S at a later date.

#IGN #Gaming #Unholy

title: The Marvels - Official Trailer (2023) Brie Larson, Samuel L. Jackson
description:
This fall, The Marvels take flight.

Carol Danvers aka Captain Marvel has reclaimed her identity from the tyrannical Kree and taken revenge on the Supreme Intelligence. But unintended consequences see Carol shouldering the burden of a destabilized universe. When her duties send her to an anomalous wormhole linked to a Kree revolutionary, her powers become entangled with that of Jersey City super-fan, Kamala Khan aka Ms. Marvel, and Carol's estranged niece, now S.A.B.E.R. astronaut Captain Monica Rambeau. Together, this unlikely trio must team-up and learn to work in concert to save the universe as "The Marvels."

Marvel Studios' "The Marvels" stars Brie Larson, Teyonah Parris, Iman Vellani, Zawe Ashton, Gary Lewis, Park Seo-joon, Zenobia Shroff, Mohan Kapur, Saagar Shaikh, and Samuel L. Jackson.

title: Bad City: Official Exclusive Trailer (2023) Hitoshi Ozawa, Akane Sakanoue | Comic Con 2023
description:
Long plagued by poverty and crime, Kaiko City has been torn apart by rampant corruption and growing violence between the local Yakuza faction and a notorious Korean crime boss. But when a mafia-connected businessman runs for mayor and begins systematically eliminating his opponents, a former police captain imprisoned for a brutal murder is released in a final desperate effort to reclaim the city.

The sophomore effort from director Kensuke Sonomura (Hydra), Bad City stars legendary Japanese actor Hitoshi Ozawa (Takeshi Kitano’s Boiling Point, Takashi Miike’s Dead or Alive), Akane Sakanoue (Alice in Borderland, Ultraman X), Masanori Mimoto (Enter The Fat Dragon, Hydra, Takashi Miike’s Yakuza Apocalypse), Lily Franky (Hirokazu Kore-eda’s Academy Award-nominated Shoplifters), and Tak Sakaguchi (Versus, Death Trance, Prisoners Of The Ghostland).

Bad City hits digital exclusively on August 1, before arriving on Blu-ray and DVD on September 19 from Well Go USA Entertainment. The trailer first played in front of the Kung Fu Extravaganza panel at San Diego Comic-Con 2023

#IGN #SDCC

title: Spider-Man 2 Hall H Panel Reactions | Comic Con 2023
description:
Marvel Studios may have not been in Hall H this year at San Diego Comic-Con, but that didn't stop Insomniac from making sure that Spider-Man was at the show in some capacity. We sat in on the Marvel's Spider-Man 2 panel to see what new information they had about this game. This is what we saw.

#IGN #SDCC

title: James Cameron Is Worried About an AI Nuclear Arms Race - IGN The Fix: Entertainment
description:
In today's Fix of Entertainment News:
James Cameron has made a couple of movies about the dangers of runaway artificial intelligence, and he sounds surprised we haven't listened to him. Speaking with CTV News, the acclaimed filmmaker is worried that AI companies will continuously one-up each other in a race akin to the nuclear arms race of the Cold War. And if you've seen his Terminator or Terminator 2 movies, you know what the outcome is. Yikes. In other news, the producers of Netflix's The Witcher series know how they'll transition from Henry Cavill to Luke Hemsworth, and they'll be taking some inspiration from the books. And finally, get a peek into an all-access family vacation at Universal Orlando Resort. This episode is brought to you by Universal Orlando Resort.
